recommendations.body: **Bars** should be avoided and required to close.

**Gyms** should be avoided and required to close.
**Restaurants** should max at 25% capacity and create outdoor dining opportunities. Customers should use take out or eat outdoors socially distanced.
**Restaurants** should create outdoor dining opportunities. Customers should use take out, outdoor dining, or indoor dining when strict social distancing can be maintained.
**Masks** should be worn by everyone outside their home, and be required for all workers in retail, personal services, assisted living.

**Gatherings** should be limited to 10 people and physical distance should be maintained.
**Gatherings** should be limited to 25 people and physical distance should be maintained.
**Schools:** Enable remote learning for all students. All government levels should invest in remote learning.

**Schools:** If sufficient [pandemic resilient learning space](http://link) exists, phase re-opening: 1st priority: preK-5 and special education services for preK-8. 2nd priority: grades 6-8 and special education services for grades 9-12.

**Schools:** If sufficient [pandemic resilient learning space](http://link) exists, phase re-opening: 1st priority: preK-5 and special education services for preK-8. 2nd priority: grades 6-8 and special education services for grades 9-12. 3rd priority: grades 9-12 on a hybrid schedule.
**Schools:** In person education is safe only if conditions for pandemic resilient learning spaces are in place.
